subject: Fines (Penalties)
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch was fined $25,000 by Nascar on Tuesday for his obscene gesture during Sunday’s Sprint Cup race, and Busch again apologized for losing his temper.
snippet: Kyle Busch was fined $25,000 by Nascar on Tuesday for his obscene gesture during Sunday’s Sprint Cup race, and Busch again apologized for losing his temper.
